personal.intro: I'm a hands-on engineer who loves building things that work at scale. Backends, cloud infra, CI/CD, AI. If it ships to production, I'm into it.
personal.about: Hey, I'm Vardan. I've got an M.Tech in Software Engineering from BITS Pilani and over 8 years of experience building full-stack products, setting up cloud infrastructure, and integrating AI into real workflows. My go-to stack is Python, Django, Node.js, and FastAPI. Every project I touch gets containerized on day one, goes through proper CI/CD, and lands on AWS or GCP. I've also been working a lot with LLMs, RAG pipelines, and AI agents lately, putting them into actual production systems (not just demos). Outside of coding, I consult with startups, teach developers, and love collaborating on interesting problems. I genuinely believe good engineers lift others up, not just build cool tech.

pipeline.title: Local Dev
pipeline.description: I create a feature branch, write the code, test it locally, and lint everything. Pre-commit hooks keep the formatting clean before I push.

pipeline.title: Code Push
pipeline.description: Push to GitHub with branch protection on. Nothing gets merged to main without a proper review and a decent PR description.

pipeline.title: CI Trigger
pipeline.description: GitHub Actions kicks in automatically on every push or PR. Secrets and env variables are pulled in securely, no manual steps.

pipeline.title: Build & Test
pipeline.description: Unit tests, integration tests, and linting all run in parallel. Trivy scans for vulnerabilities. If anything fails, the pipeline stops right there.

pipeline.title: Docker Image
pipeline.description: Multi-stage Docker build creates a slim production image. Gets tagged with a semantic version and pushed to Amazon ECR.

pipeline.title: Cloud Deploy
pipeline.description: Rolling deployment to AWS ECS or GCP Cloud Run. Zero downtime, and if the health check fails, it rolls back automatically.

pipeline.title: Direct Hosting
pipeline.description: For client-facing sites, I deploy straight to a VPS via SSH. Nginx handles reverse proxy, Let's Encrypt does SSL, PM2 keeps processes alive.

pipeline.title: Monitor & Alert
pipeline.description: CloudWatch dashboards for latency and errors, Uptime Robot for endpoint monitoring, and Slack alerts when something looks off.

ai.summary: I actually build and ship AI stuff, not just talk about it. RAG pipelines, LangChain APIs, multi-step agents that replace tedious manual work. It's engineering, not a slideshow.
useCases: Built an internal knowledge bot using LangChain + Pinecone that cut L1 support tickets by 40% in the first month.
Created a document processing pipeline with GPT-4o that classifies, extracts, and summarizes PDFs at scale. Handles 10k+ docs a day.
Set up autonomous AI agents that handle full workflows: data ingestion, transformation, enrichment, then Slack/email alerts. Saved around 12 hours of manual work every week.
Built context-aware chatbots with conversation memory and multi-tenant support. REST API with JWT auth and rate limiting.

education.description: Focused on distributed systems, cloud-native app design, and software architecture patterns. Did my thesis on scalable microservices orchestration for large-scale applications.

projects.name: CloudOps Automation Suite
projects.description: A DevOps dashboard I built to spin up and tear down AWS infra using Terraform. It tracks service health in real-time via CloudWatch, auto-scales based on custom metrics, shows cost breakdowns, and pings Slack when things need attention.

projects.name: AI Document Intelligence
projects.description: A document processing API that uses GPT-4o to pull structured data from PDFs and images, classify doc types, and generate summaries. Runs serverless on AWS Lambda with S3 storage and async job queuing.

projects.name: RAG Knowledge Base API
projects.description: A production-grade RAG system with semantic search via Pinecone, conversation memory with sliding windows, and full multi-tenant isolation. Secured behind JWT with rate limiting and per-tenant token tracking.

projects.name: E-Commerce Microservices Platform
projects.description: A modular e-commerce backend split into independent services for auth, inventory, orders, and payments. Each service owns its own DB, talks via REST, and deploys independently through GitHub Actions to AWS ECS. Redis handles session caching.

projects.name: GymCRM - Gym Management System
projects.description: Currently building a CRM for gym businesses. Covers member onboarding, subscription management, attendance tracking, trainer assignment, and revenue reports. Clean Django admin plus a REST API for future mobile app integration.

projects.name: Corporate Web Platform
projects.description: A complete business website and client portal for a consulting firm. Public marketing site, secure client login, project tracking, document sharing, and CMS for admins. Deployed on a managed VPS with Nginx and automated SSL.

projects.name: TallySync - ERP Integration Layer
projects.description: Middleware that connects Tally accounting data with a custom Django dashboard. Real-time inventory, purchase orders, vendor ledgers, and automated GST reports. Basically killed the manual data entry that was eating up hours every day.
